bibl.title: A Repayment of a Loan.
bibl.note: This is a revised chapter of a doctoral thesis presented to the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 1988 entitled Select Papyri. - Theadelphia, 6 July A.D. 133. The borrower, Hermas, son of Heron, is known from two other documents: P. Col. Inv. 17 (= S.B. XVIII, 13313); P. Osl. II, 39.
bibl.seg: WARGA Richard G., A Repayment of a Loan.

This is a revised chapter of a doctoral thesis presented to the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 1988 entitled Select Papyri. - Theadelphia, 6 July A.D. 133. The borrower, Hermas, son of Heron, is known from two other documents: P. Col. Inv. 17 (= S.B. XVIII, 13313); P. Osl. II, 39.
